explains: n. 协议，条约；符合，一致
v. 使受到，给予（某种待遇）；（与……）一致，符合
wordGroup: accord with 同…相符合；与…一致
in accord with 同…相符合；与…一致
out of accord with 同…不一致
of its own accord 自动地；自愿地；自然而然

sentences.en: These results accord closely with our predictions.
sentences.cn: 这些结果和我们的预测相当一致。

sentences.en: This action would not be in accord with our policy.
sentences.cn: 这一行动不会符合我们的方针。

sentences.en: He did not quit as France's prime minister of his own accord.
sentences.cn: 他不是自愿地辞去法国总理一职的。
